# Inn (Building)
## Overview
**Inn**

**Create** 52 Goods, 5 Influence, 47 Labor (2,130 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bar (Room)|Bar]], 1 [[Bath (Room)|Bath]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Lodging (Room)|Lodging]], 1 [[Stall (Room)|Stall]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]]

A place for visitors to stay and rest.
